tasks.name: Translate docs/index.html (Lines 1-200)
tasks.description: Translate all user-visible text content and relevant attributes (alt, title, aria-label, placeholder) within lines 1-200 of docs/index.html to natural and accurate English. Preserve existing HTML structure, comments, and script tags. For elements with data-i18n attributes, translate the default text content but leave the data-i18n key attribute unchanged.
tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Open docs/index.html.
2. Focus on lines 1-200.
3. Identify and translate text nodes and specified attributes within this range.
4. Ensure HTML structure and data-i18n keys are preserved.
5. Save changes.
tasks.verificationCriteria: Inspect lines 1-200 of docs/index.html. Verify all user-visible text and attributes are in English. Check structure and data-i18n keys.
tasks.summary: Lines 1-200 were already in English. No changes needed.
